description: In this course, LaDonna will teach you how to start and operate a home daycare business. You will learn how to set up your business, market your services, track your finances, and operate efficiently. You will have access to tools and resources every childcare provider needs. If you have a love for children and are looking for a way to work from home, the childcare business is for you!
title: Work From Home: How to Start a Home Daycare Business
